```{r}
set.seed(42)
```

Generate a 5 x 10 matrix of random integers between 1-100

```{r}
m <- matrix(sample(1:100, 50, replace = TRUE), nrow = 5, ncol = 10)
```

Set column and row names

```{r}
colnames(m) <- c("cond1", "cond2", "cond3", "cond4", "cond5", 
                 "ctr1", "ctr2", "ctr3", "ctr4", "ctr5") 
rownames(m) <- c("gene1", "gene2", "gene3", "gene4", "gene5")
```

Compute fold-change for each gene

```{r}
cond_mean <- rowMeans(m[, 1:5]) 
ctrl_mean <- rowMeans(m[, 6:10])

fold_change <- cond_mean / ctrl_mean

print(fold_change)
```
